availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Watson T. Records (Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. )

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Leonora "Ann" Records. Father of Eli Records, Missouri E. Records, John Records, Patterson Records, Millard M. Records, Lydia A. Records, and Chambers Records. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1850. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, District No. 1, p. 390B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 219.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Precinct No. 4, p. 441A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Pendleton County, KY, June and July 1863, p. 203.
